body:
All Versions

  • Data Vintage: New page under gear menu shows Update frequency and Last refreshed for the current Project, and Product(s) for networks and competitor networks for the currently selected project
  • New User process: New user confirmation process now includes selecting the project and specialty mapping
  • Activity Stream: Click on the image in Activity Stream to view the activities for that user
  • Create a List: Export includes only networks selected in the current list
